description:
Nova doesn't catches some set of exception in create server API method. It causes responses with 500 (Internal Server Error) status code instead of 400 (Bad Request) code.

These exceptions are:

 * CPUThreadPolicyConfigurationInvalid
 * ImageCPUPinningForbidden
 * ImageCPUThreadPolicyForbidden
 * MemoryPageSizeInvalid
 * MemoryPageSizeForbidden
 * RealtimeConfigurationInvalid
 * RealtimeMaskNotFoundOrInvalid
title: Numa related exception didn't process by create server API

commit d32d8c0ee1dbbdcc161bf6a7fcee3c5209be6e18
Author: Sergey Nikitin <email address hidden>
Date:   Wed Oct 26 18:56:30 2016 +0300

    Catch NUMA related exceptions in create server API method
    
    The exceptions are raised by numa_get_constraints() method should be
    caught by REST API layer explicitly. If we wouldn't catch them
    nova will return responce with 500 status code instead of 400.
    
    Following exceptions were caught:
    
     * CPUThreadPolicyConfigurationInvalid
     * ImageCPUPinningForbidden
     * ImageCPUThreadPolicyForbidden
     * MemoryPageSizeInvalid
     * MemoryPageSizeForbidden
     * RealtimeConfigurationInvalid
     * RealtimeMaskNotFoundOrInvalid
    
    Closes-Bug: #1636911
    Closes-Bug: #1636688
    
    Change-Id: I7c06bb2c3094eee403e615d6027c38502eaabd49
